price: How many towns We have destroyed, and Our punishment came upon them at night or while they were taking midday rest.
arabic: وَكَم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ هُمۡ قَآئِلُونَ
